topics.name: Canine lymphoma staging and substage impact

quizBank.question: Which stage generally indicates bone marrow involvement in lymphoma staging systems?
quizBank.explanation: Stage V generally includes bone marrow, blood, or other non-lymphoid organ involvement.

quizBank.question: List two common dose-limiting toxicities to monitor during CHOP-like protocols.
quizBank.explanation: Hematologic and GI toxicities are commonly monitored and can drive dose adjustments.
